label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_025
content:
## 2024-08-19 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 126
- Active: 115
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 43
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 11

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 30
- Mid Dose: 31
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 33

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 58.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 92.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 139.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 90.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 17.8
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 90.9
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 31.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 135.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 211.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 145.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 36.9
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 118.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 41.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 193.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 278.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 201.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 46.8
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 14.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 3.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 16.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 32.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 26.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 3.8

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 40.6
- Erythema Percentage: 23.2
- Swelling Percentage: 7.1
- Induration Percentage: 7.5
- Mean Pain Duration (hours): 45.0

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 8.6
- Fatigue Percentage: 21.6
- Myalgia Percentage: 28.2
- Headache Percentage: 24.5
- Chills Percentage: 8.9

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K): Mean: 6.4
- WBC (K) SD: 2.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage: Mean: 35.6
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 8.0
- Neutrophil Percentage: Mean: 52.9
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.1
- Platelets (K): Mean: 250
- Platelets (K) SD: 38
- CRP (mg/L): Mean: 3.7
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.5
- Hemoglobin (g/dL): Mean: 14.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2506, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2547, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C
- Site 05 monitoring visit, 2 minor findings
- Immunology core lab QC report received

### Notes
- Week 25: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 126 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
